In this session, [Ayu Dewi](https://researchinformation.amsterdamumc.org/en/persons/ayu-dewi) will give a live demonstration of how to create visualisations that summarise the results of your literature review.

Want to attend or present? [Get in touch](mailto:s.h.langton@amsterdamumc.nl)!
